item.title: Steam to Accept Payments via Bitcoin in its Next Update
item.description:
Steam to Accept Payments via Bitcoin in its Next Update

The team behind Steam, a digital distribution platform developed by Valve Corporation offering digital rights management, multiplayer gaming and social networking services, has announced that the platform will officially begin to accept payments via bitcoin. CoinTelegraph has reached out to Bitpay for more information about their partnership with Steam.

item.title: Using the Coin Control Feature of Your GUI Qt Wallet
item.description:
Using the Coin Control Feature of Your GUI Qt Wallet

Taking advantage of the Coin Control feature is something considered a bit more advanced, especially if you don't have built-in support in the specific crypto currency's GUI Qt wallet and have to use the console.

item.title: Despite Naysayers, Rising Bitcoin Price Suggests the Digital Currency Is Alive and Well
item.description:
Despite Naysayers, Rising Bitcoin Price Suggests the Digital Currency Is Alive and Well

The rising price of Bitcoin, reaching $450 at press time, follows several months of steady growth in Bitcoin price and transaction volumes, growing trade activity, particularly in Russia and South America, and continued expansion in the mining industry, all suggesting that Bitcoin is here to stay.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Breaks $450 as Global Markets Turn Positive - CoinDesk
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Breaks $450 as Global Markets Turn Positive - CoinDesk

Markets Weekly is a column analyzing price movements in the global digital currency markets, and the technology's use case as an asset class. The price of bitcoin broke past $450 this week, as markets rallied in response to perceived progress surrounding the network's block capacity dilemma.

item.title: Where is Gavin's AMA? * /r/Bitcoin
item.description:
Where is Gavin's AMA? * /r/Bitcoin

Just curious how this isn't anywhere to be found on r/Bitcoin. Shouldn't the #2 guy after satoshi talking to Chinese miners be worth...

item.title: Bitcoin's Big Boom: When Will Blockchain Go Mainstream?
item.description:
Bitcoin's Big Boom: When Will Blockchain Go Mainstream?

Gil Luria, Wedbush Securities technology analyst, discusses the rally in Bitcoin with Bloomberg's Joe Weisenthal and Scarlet Fu on "What'd You Miss?" (Source: Bloomberg)

item.title: What is the exact value of upcoming block rewards?
item.description:
What is the exact value of upcoming block rewards?

Bitcoin Stack Exchange is a question and answer site for Bitcoin crypto-currency enthusiasts. It's 100% free, no registration required. Sign up Here's how it works: Anybody can ask a question Anybody can answer The best answers are voted up and rise to the top Wrote a simple script that literally just halves 50 BTC (the initial block reward).

item.title: AG speech 27th April Virtual currencies
item.description:
AG speech 27th April Virtual currencies

MEP Antanas Guoga on virtual currencies at the IMCO committee at the European Parliament
